name: my-awesome-therapist-app
description: My Therapist App is designed with the independent therapist and their practice in mind. The app will include views for the therapist (authorization required), for clients (authorization required), and for the public (non-authenticated users).

scripts.copy: cp src/index.html dist/index.html && cp -R src/app/images dist/app
scripts.dev: npm run webpack:dev && npm run copy && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline --hot
scripts.dev:no-hot: npm run webpack:dev && npm run copy && webpack-dev-server --content-base src/ --inline
scripts.dev:start: npm run webpack:dev && npm run copy && npm start
